meanings.definition: A person or thing that interferes.
meanings.sent1: The noisy interferers disrupted the class with their constant talking.
meanings.sent2: The interferers in the group project caused delays in completing the task.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous interferers played pranks on their classmates during recess.
meanings.sent4: The interferers in the system were like stubborn obstacles blocking progress.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the interferers that can hinder your success and goals.
